subject: home phone answering maching EVP
author: bhali333
full_text:
hey everybody,

I recieved this at 8:30 AM this morning on my home telephone answering 
machine. I posted it in my main folder in the files section.

It is the third message I have recieved in this fashion in all the 
years I have been involved in the paranormal.

this just gors to show if you don't call them they will call you!

bruce
